nodes.text: 16AA889 Starfield Road was a three story house owned by Tanass Brila and Renia Brila. It was located on a Mid Rim industrial world and used as a safehouse for the local Rebel cell.
The upper level had a large study and overlooked the courtyard area on the mid-level.
The mid-level had the living areas, including a master suite, guest bedrooms, and kitchen. There was a secluded courtyard with a pool on this level.

The lower level contained a garage for parking speeders and a workshop with various tools. There was also a hidden room located in the center of this level accessible via a secret door located in the workshop. A trapdoor in the ceiling of the workshop provided hidden access to the master suite on the floor above.
